title: A Synagogue Grows in Dubai
description:
This week, Jews around the world are celebrating Hanukkah. That includes a congregation in Dubai that has long practiced in secret. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Jonathan Ferziger who recently visited the synagogue and explains why now it is stepping out of the shadows. 
FOLLOW UP
 Jonathan's latest report: As the Gulf Warms Up to Israel, a Synagogue Grows in Dubai
You can follow Jonathan at: @jferziger
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
